import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngular, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJava, faJsSquare, faReact } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { return setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }) return (
